name: INSetAudioSourceInCarIntent
desc: A request to change the source of audio playback in a CarPlay-enabled vehicle.DeprecatedThis intent is no longer available. You may define a custom intent instead. For more information, see Deprecated SiriKit Intent Domains.

items.name: init(audioSource: INCarAudioSource, relativeAudioSourceReference: INRelativeReference)
items.desc: Initializes the intent object with the specified audio source information.

items.name: var relativeAudioSourceReference: INRelativeReference
items.desc: The relative audio source to select.
